Address.label: Address
Address.value: 11995 EL CAMINO REAL, SAN DIEGO, California, 92130, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Realty Income owns roughly 11,100 properties, most of which are freestanding, single-tenant, triple-net-leased retail properties. Its properties are located in 49 states and Puerto Rico and are leased to 250 tenants from 47 industries. Recent acquisitions have added industrial, office, manufacturing, and distribution properties, which make up roughly 17% of revenue.

value.name: Gregory J. Whyte
value.title: Chief Operating Officer & Executive Vice President
